lines.text: I hope to be dead and buried by the time I reach your age. Just think you've been living for forty years.
I know, I must be a biological phenomenon.
You don't look forty. You look a sort of well-preserved sixty.
I feel like throwing myself in the river.
I shouldn't do that, it's full of rubbish.
I'm not sorry and I'm not glad.
I dreamt about you last night - fell out of bed twice!
Do you like me more than you don't like me or do you not like me more than you do?
You need somebody to love you while you're looking for somebody to love.
